span.p: Customer Info Database - Names, Contact details, Account IDs

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Billing Database - Transactions, Payment tokens, Addresses

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Finance Data Lake - Transactions (with customer IDs), Usage data (pseudonymized)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: General Ledger System - Aggregated financial data, Limited personal data
